sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">d31c25c347f23110274adeae536d4370</macroponent><name>Set current version</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    api.data.get_update_versions_1.output.result.forEach((item) => {
        console.log(item.state)
        if (item.state == "current") {
            api.setState('currentVersion', item.payload)
        }
    });

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-17 09:55:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>dc25582347477110274adeae536d43ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set current version</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_dc25582347477110274adeae536d43ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-17 10:11:13</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
